name: TalenTailor
tag_list: jobs, career, job-search, gulf-jobs, talent, talent-search, jobs-in-dubai, recruitment
overview:
TalenTailor aims at revolutionizing the online recruitment industry by providing Talents (job seekers) a free online Employment Qualification Assessment (EQA) that covers three major areas: Math Skills, English Proficiency and Analytical Capabilities. In an era where more people are using the web to search for careers, this technique gives candidates the ability to prove themselves amongst other job applicants and show that they are a perfect fit for the coveted position.

From an employer’s perspective, looking at a candidate’s EQA score & report before approaching them for an interview provides you with an over all insight about their future potential, development needs, and ultimately saves you time and money in the hiring process. In addition, you have the option of providing your own specific interview questions for the candidates, Once added, candidates must answer these questions in order to apply for this specific Job Posting.

With social networking between professionals, detailed EQA reports and less expensive packages than the leading online recruitment competition, www.TalenTailor.com is the optimal solution for your company’s HR needs.
